typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id_cliente as string,
		nome as string,
		idade as string,
		data_nascimento as string,
		tipo as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		id_cliente as short,
		nome as string,
		idade as short,
		data_nascimento as string,
		tipo as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
